name: Aether Crypt
description:
My #ldjam entry for the 35th edition which theme was Shapeshift.

Description

The creature you control is made out of Aether, a newly discovered atom that can, with enough negative charges collected through electrons, transform itself into an already existing atom or molecule. Find your way out by using your different abilities.

Controls (Gamepad recommended)ActionGamepadKeyboardMove D-pad + A to jump WASD/ZQSD/Arrow keysSwitch transformation Right and left shoulder buttons ETransform X SpaceCredits

Art and Code by Tselmek

Music by Cynicus
